p: Inoculated EPC cells showing CPEs were first subjected to a rhabdovirus ELISA test (SVCV Ag ELISA, TestLine, Brno, Czech Republic) and an SVCV-specific PCR and nested PCR using cDNA, as described by the OIE [ 10]. To check for other closely related spriviviruses or possible SVCV variants, a generic nested RT-PCR targeting the L gene of fish vesiculotype viruses was also tested [ 7].
